詩意: This hexagram is a symbol of the dragon gate being opened. Everything will change for the better.
解曰: Prisoners are pardoned. Illness means peace. Longmen has a chance to meet. Famous throughout the capital.
籤詩故事一:
◇Luo Tong pays homage to him
The Tang Dynasty fully mobilized to pacify the Northern Fan. Emperor Taizong decided to lead the expedition in person, but was trapped in Muyang City, so Cheng Yaojin returned to the Central Plains to rescue troops. Unfortunately, he was captured by the Northern Fan soldiers. Cheng Yaojin was eloquent and eloquent. Princess Tu Lu of Beifan promised to let him return to the Central Plains to ask for reinforcements.
In the martial arts competition, the generals to conquer the north were recruited. The seventeen-year-old Luo Tong came out on top and took command of the expedition to the north.
(The idiom "Luotong sweeps the north" is a metaphor for a successful young man)
